## Mobile Optimization & Touch Experience

**Phase:** Phase 2 - User Experience & Polish
**Timeline:** 6-8 weeks
**Section:** 2.1

### Goal
Deliver exceptional user experience with mobile optimization and accessibility

### Impact
Makes app truly mobile-friendly

### Effort Estimate
2 weeks

### Priority
P1

### Tasks

- [ ] Optimize touch targets for mobile (44x44px minimum)
- [ ] Add swipe gestures for queue management
- [ ] Implement pull-to-refresh for library updates
- [ ] Optimize image loading for mobile networks
- [ ] Add offline mode for cached content
- [ ] Improve mobile navigation patterns
- [ ] Test on real devices (iOS, Android)
